description: '''Detroit drill''' is a [[subgenre]] of [[drill music]], centered in [[Detroit]], that began as a derivative of the drill music scene in [[Chicago]] and [[New York City]] and later became a derivative of [[UK drill]] with its 808 percussion and sliding notes by producers from the UK drill scene. Detroit drill emerged around 2019 with the single "MWBL" by [[42 Dugg]] and [[Tee Grizzley]]. It was made popular in the mainstream with the 2021 single "4 Da Gang" by [[42 Dugg]]. Other notable Detroit drill artists include [[Icewear Vezzo]], [[Sada Baby]] and [[Teejayx6]].
